segments.text: No . I ’ m serious . I ’ m going to quit my job .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s amazing ! You got a good pay here , didn ’ t you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s true . But I can ’ t show my abilities .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on ! Don ’ t be silly !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your present job is something better . Why do you change ?
segments.speaker: S2
